languages.text: {n}Измученные изощренными дознаниями, вожаки заключенных повелели истреблять каждого, кто подает признаки помешательства. Чистки выкосили многих рабочих, но исчезновения и странные феномены прекратились.{/n}

{n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Измученные изощренными дознаниями, вожаки заключенных повелели истреблять каждого, кто подает признаки помешательства. Чистки выкосили многих рабочих, но исчезновения и странные феномены прекратились.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Exhausted by sophisticated interrogations, the prison instigators have been ordered to exterminate anyone who would show any signs of insanity. The purges have wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena had stopped.{/n}

{n}Exhausted by sophisticated interrogations, the prison instigators have been ordered to exterminate anyone who would show any signs of insanity. The purges have wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena had stopped.{/n}

{n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

{n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚犯首领被复杂的审讯搞得心力交瘁，他们给其余犯人下了命令，要求消灭所有表现出精神失常迹象的人。许多工人在这场大清洗中丧命，但失踪与怪象也停止了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚犯首领被复杂的审讯搞得心力交瘁，他们给其余犯人下了命令，要求消灭所有表现出精神失常迹象的人。许多工人在这场大清洗中丧命，但失踪与怪象也停止了。{/n}
{n}经过复杂的审讯之后，奴隶工头筋疲力尽。他们得到了命令，消灭所有表现出精神失常迹象的人。这场大清洗消灭了许多工人，但失踪与怪象也停止了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Agotados por los sofisticados interrogatorios, los supervisores ordenaron al resto de convictos exterminar a todo aquel que mostrara algún signo de locura. Las purgas acabaron con muchos trabajadores, pero las desapariciones y los fenómenos extraños han cesado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Agotados por los sofisticados interrogatorios, los supervisores ordenaron al resto de convictos exterminar a todo aquel que mostrara algún signo de locura. Las purgas acabaron con muchos trabajadores, pero las desapariciones y los fenómenos extraños han cesado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}洗練された尋問に疲れ果てた囚人のリーダたちは、精神異常の兆候を示す者を抹殺するよう命じられた。粛清によって多くの労働者が一掃されたが、姿を消したり奇妙な現象が出現することはなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}洗練された尋問に疲れ果てた囚人の職長は、精神異常の兆候を示す者を抹殺するよう命じられた。粛清によって多くの労働者が一掃されたが、姿を消したり奇妙な現象が出現することはなくなった。{/n}
{n}洗練された尋問に疲れ果てた囚人の職長は、精神異常の兆候を示す者を抹殺するよう命じられた。粛清によって多くの労働者が一掃されたが、姿を消したり奇妙な現象が出現することはなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Exténués par des interrogatoires poussés, les chefs ordonnent au reste des détenus d'éliminer quiconque montre des signes de folie. Ces purges scellent le destin de nombreux ouvriers, mais les disparitions et les phénomènes étranges cessent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Exténués par des interrogatoires poussés, les chefs ordonnent au reste des détenus d'éliminer quiconque montre des signes de folie. Ces purges scellent le destin de nombreux ouvriers, mais les disparitions et les phénomènes étranges cessent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Von den komplizierten Verhören erschöpft, befahlen die Anführer dem Rest der Sträflinge, jeden zu töten, der Anzeichen von Wahnsinn zeigte. Den Säuberungen fielen zahlreiche Arbeiter zum Opfer, doch die merkwürdigen Phänomene fanden ein Ende und es verschwanden keine Sklaven mehr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Von den komplizierten Verhören erschöpft, befahlen die Anführer dem Rest der Sträflinge, jeden zu töten, der Anzeichen von Wahnsinn zeigte. Den Säuberungen fielen zahlreiche Arbeiter zum Opfer, doch die merkwürdigen Phänomene fanden ein Ende und es verschwanden keine Sklaven mehr.{/n}

{n}Erschöpft von den intensiven Verhören erhielten die Vorarbeiter der Gefangenen den Befehl, jeden zu eliminieren, der irgendein Anzeichen des Wahnsinns zeigte. Den Säuberungen fielen zahlreiche Arbeiter zum Opfer, doch die merkwürdigen Phänomene fanden ein Ende und es verschwanden keine Sklaven mehr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karmaşık sorgulardan yorulan liderler, mahkûmların geri kalanına delilik belirtisi gösteren herkesi infaz etme emri verildi. Tasfiye sürecinde birçok işçi yaşamını yitirse dahi kaybolma vakaları ve tuhaf olaylar sonlanmış oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worn down by sophisticated interrogations, the leaders ordered the rest of the convicts to exterminate anyone who showed signs of insanity. The purges wiped out many workers, but the disappearances and strange phenomena have stopped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Karmaşık sorgulardan yorulan liderler, mahkûmların geri kalanına delilik belirtisi gösteren herkesi infaz etme emri verildi. Tasfiye sürecinde birçok işçi yaşamını yitirse dahi kaybolma vakaları ve tuhaf olaylar sonlanmış oldu.{/n}
